attributes.action: Ban smoking at all bus stops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am currently a student doing my as levels, everyday when I go to get the bus home I have to wait about thirty minutes, and everyday there is always a new person who stands and smokes for the half hour I'm waiting there.  I believe this is unfair, as i feel i am forced to wait at the bus stop inhaling these fumes.  Even though some people argue that it is an open space and these people have the right to smoke, i believe i should have the right not to inhale it.
